tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

AppService.description: The application service that the object belongs to.

CaCertFile.description: the trusted root and intermediate certificate authorities.

CrlFile.description: Specifies the file name of the Certificate Revocation List. Only supported in IKEv1.

DpdDelay.description: Specifies the number of seconds between Dead Peer Detection messages.

GeneratePolicy.description: Enable or disable the generation of Security Policy Database entries(SPD) when the device is the responder of the IKE remote node.

Lifetime.description: Defines the lifetime in minutes of an IKE SA which will be proposed in the phase 1 negotiations.

Mode.description: Defines the exchange mode for phase 1 when racoon is the initiator, or the acceptable exchange mode when racoon is the responder.

MyCertFile.description: Specifies the name of the certificate file object.

MyCertKeyFile.description: Specifies the name of the certificate key file object.

MyCertKeyPassphrase.description: Specifies the passphrase of the key used for my-cert-key-file.

MyIdType.description: Specifies the identifier type sent to the remote host to use in the phase 1 negotiation.

MyIdValue.description: Specifies the identifier value sent to the remote host in the phase 1 negotiation.

NatTraversal.description: Enables use of the NAT-Traversal IPsec extension.

Passive.description: Specifies whether the local IKE agent can be the initiator of the IKE negotiation with this ike-peer.

PeersCertFile.description: Specifies the peer’s certificate for authentication.

PeersCertType.description: Specifies that the only peers-cert-type supported is certfile.

PeersIdType.description: Specifies which of address, fqdn, asn1dn, user-fqdn or keyid-tag types to use as peers-id-type.

PeersIdValue.description: Specifies the peer’s identifier to be received.

Phase1AuthMethod.description: Specifies the authentication method used for phase 1 negotiation.

Phase1EncryptAlgorithm.description: Specifies the encryption algorithm used for the isakmp phase 1 negotiation.

Phase1HashAlgorithm.description: Defines the hash algorithm used for the isakmp phase 1 negotiation.

Phase1PerfectForwardSecrecy.description: Defines the Diffie-Hellman group for key exchange to provide perfect forward secrecy.

PresharedKey.description: Specifies the preshared key for ISAKMP SAs.

PresharedKeyEncrypted.description: Display the encrypted preshared-key for the IKE remote node.

Prf.description: Specifies the pseudo-random function used to derive keying material for all cryptographic operations.

ProxySupport.description: If this value is enabled, both values of ID payloads in the phase 2 exchange are used as the addresses of end-point of IPsec-SAs.

RemoteAddress.description: Specifies the IP address of the IKE remote node.

ReplayWindowSize.description: Specifies the replay window size of the IPsec SAs negotiated with the IKE remote node.

State.description: Enables or disables this IKE remote node.

TrafficSelector.description: Specifies the names of the traffic-selector objects associated with this ike-peer.

VerifyCert.description: Specifies whether to verify the certificate chain of the remote peer based on the trusted certificates in ca-cert-file.

Version.description: Specifies which version of IKE to be used.
